rukus.text: Kiya aap ney unn ki taraf nazar nahi daali jinhon ney Allah ki nemat kay badley na shukri ki aur apni qom ko halakat kay ghar mein laa utara
Yani dozakh mein jiss mien yeh sab jayen gay jo bad tareen thikana hai
Enhon ney Allah kay humsar bana liye kay logon ko Allah ki raah say behkayen. Aap keh dijiye kay khair mazay kerlo tumhari baaz gasht to aakhir jahannum hi hai

Meray eman walay bandon say keh dijiye kay namazon ko qaeem rakhen aur jo kuch hum ney dey rakha hai uss mein say kuch na kuch posheeda aur zahir kharach kertay rahen iss say pehlay kay woh din aajaye jiss mein na kharid-o-farokht hogi na dosti aur mohabbat

Allah woh hai jiss ney aasmanon aur zamin ko peda kiya hai aur aasmanon say barish barsa ker iss kay zariye say tumhari rozi kay liye phal nikaley hain aur kashtiyon ko tumharay bus mein ker diya hai kay daryaon mein uss kay hukum say chalen phiren. Ussi ney nadiyan aur nehren tumharay ikhtiyar mein ker di hain
Ussi ney tumharay liye sooraj chand ko musakhar kerdiya hai kay barabar hi chal rahey hain aur raat din ko bhi tumharay kaam mein laga rakha hai
Ussi ney tumhen tumhari mun mangi kul cheezon mein say dey rakha hai. Agar tum Allah kay ehsan ginna chahao to unhen pooray ginn bhi nahi saktay. Yaqeenan insan bara hi bey insaf aur na shukra hai
